about.title: Generation AI
about.privacyStart:
The GenAI Breakable Machine was funded by the Strategic Research Council (SRC) established within the Research Council of Finland, grants #352859, #352870, and #352876. The application is a part of the Generation AI project. The application was developed by Olli Hilke, as a research trainee at the University of Eastern Finland. If you have any enquiries regarding the tool you can send them to olli.hilke@uef.fi or to nicolas.pope@uef.fi

Copyright © 2025 Olli Hilke.
privacy: Welcome to our Privacy Notice, designed to inform you about how we handle your personal data following the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) when you use our website featuring the GenAI Breakable Machine.

To make the subject matter of this notice clearer, let us define some terms from the GDPR. The "controller" refers to us, as we decide how and why your personal data is used, which also makes us responsible for protecting your personal data. "Personal data" includes any information that can identify you directly or indirectly, like your IP address. "Processing" covers all actions done with your data, such as collecting, storing, using, and deleting it.
It is important to read this notice to understand what data we collect from you, why we collect it, what we do with it, and what rights you have regarding your data.
If you have any questions about this notice, please reach out to the controller:
**Dr. Nicolas Pope**,
**Postal address:** University of Eastern Finland, Länsikatu 15, 80110 Joensuu, Finland.
**Email:** nicolas.pope@uef.fi
### 1. Data Processing Activity:
We log IP addresses.
However, we do not use cookies for tracking or analytics; instead, we provide content based solely on your inputs.
### 2. Purposes of Processing:
Logging IP addresses helps maintain website integrity and security by identifying and preventing malicious activities.
### 3. Legal Basis for Processing:

Primarily, we process IP addresses for security reasons, based on our legitimate interest in protecting our website and data as per Article 6(1)(f) GDPR. Again, we may also process data based on your consent under Article 6(1)(a) GDPR if you would like to exercise your right to access your logged IP address. In addition, we may process your personal data if we are instructed to do so by a competent court under Article 6(1)(c).
### 4. Legitimate Interests Pursued:
Our goal is to keep the website running by maintaining website integrity, and security, and preventing abuse.
### 5. Security:
We implement security measures to protect your IP addresses from unlawful access or damage. Your IP addresses are encrypted during any subsequent transfer.
### 6. Data Recipients:
Only authorized website personnel can access your IP address for security and maintenance purposes.
### 7. Data Transfers:
IP addresses may be transferred to Microsoft servers, but we ensure GDPR compliance for data protection.
### 8. Storage Limitation:
We keep IP addresses only as long as necessary, typically up to 7 days, unless required by law.
### 9. Your Rights:
Under GDPR, you have rights including

* Right to be informed: In addition to informing, you about processing purposes, retention periods, and to whom your data is shared, you have the right to be informed on how we collect. We collect your IP address when you visit our website.
* Right to access: you can request a copy of your logged IP address and associated log data.

* Right to rectification: if the logged data is inaccurate or incomplete, you can request rectification although IP address is not typically something that can be corrected in the same way as other data.
* Right to erasure: you can request deletion of your IP address within 7 days of your last visit to this website since your address is deleted automatically after 7 days.
* Right to object: you can object to the processing of your IP addresses.
* Right to lodge a complaint: you can lodge a complaint to the supervisory authority if you think that your data is not processed following GDPR provisions.
### 10. Updates to This Privacy Notice:
We may update this notice to reflect changes in our data processing practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any changes.
We value your privacy and we are committed to protect your data and ensuring GDPR compliance. If you have questions or want to exercise your rights, contact us at nicolas.pope@uef.fi.

usernameError.short: The username must be 3 or more characters
usernameError.takenFree: The username is already taken. If you are trying to reconnect, press button below "Enter"

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.info: The page you are looking for does not exist. Please check the URL or go back to the <Link>home page</Link>

somethingWrong.title: Something went wrong
somethingWrong.info: Please report this issue to <Link>our project on github</Link> if you have time, including the information below. Refresh the page to try again.

1.title: Connect
1.tip: Students appear above when connected. You can remove a player using the top panel. First, select a user and then click "Remove" or "Kick".

2.title: Select
2.tip: Select a label for students to spoof from the dropdown menu. You can change the model using the "Change classifier model" button. Changing the label or the model will not affect players' previous scores.

3.title: Explore
3.tip: The game is set, and students can start playing now. Start by pressing the play icon on the bottom panel or on the guidance panel located on the left. If needed, you can reset a player's score by selecting the player and clicking "Reset user's score on label: ...".

4.title: Heatmap
4.tip: The heatmap is now enabled for students. You can force it on from the guidance panel. You can toggle heatmap availability using the flame icon in the bottom panel.

5.title: Dataset
5.tip: Exploring the training dataset is now enabled for students. You can force the dataset view on from the guidance panel. You can toggle dataset view availability using the images icon in the bottom panel. You can go back to step 3 to see how students perform.

6.title: Results
6.tip: Remember that you can pause the game from the guidance or bottom panel. You can view result images by clicking them. Select a label from the left to access individual results for each label. In the individual results, you can also view the heatmap image of selected result image when the image is clicked

7.title: Finish
7.tip: You have finished a round of Breakable Machine! Move to the "Select" phase to choose a new label by clicking reset button on the guidance panel. Resetting will not affect scores on previous labels. Resetting will also disable the heatmap and dataset for student. You can save the results from the Save button at the guidance panel

1.title: Using camera
1.tip: The game uses live feed from your camera. You do not have to use any buttons to take a picture

animals.title: Animals
animals.description: Classifier is fine-tuned with 11 different animals. Harder model to spoof.

continue.title: Continue saved game
continue.description: Load previously saved game results. Select model after loading to continue game.

jobs.title: Jobs
jobs.description: Classifier is fine-tuned with collection of seven different occupations.

own.title: Own model
own.description: Upload your own model created with Gen-AI Teachable Machine

messages.cameraPermission: To allow direct connections between devices you need to allow temporary access to the camera.
messages.wifiNetwork: Your data is being sent over the internet because you are not using the same Wi-Fi network.
messages.permNetwork: Your data is being sent over the internet because you didn't allow camera access.
messages.loadingModel: Wait for model and camera to load.

errors.id-in-use: Someone is already using this code
errors.peer-not-found: The code could not be found
errors.missing-ice: Could not connect, you may be offline.
errors.bad-browser: Your device doesn't support this app
errors.unknownContent: There is a problem with the media content
errors.load: Could not load the media content
errors.download: Could not download the media content

labels.save: Download scores and images from the session as a ZIP-file

messages.kick: You have been removed from the game. You can rejoin. Please ask your teacher for more details.
messages.remove: You have been removed from the game. Your profile and progress has been removed. Please ask your teacher for more details.

message.usernameTaken: Username was taken, try again after reload...

labels.allowHidePicture: Allow students to hide their result pictures
labels.allowStartTermAgain: Allow students to reset own scores
labels.pauseOnChange: Pause game when label is changed

titles.waitForLabel: Wait for Teacher to set the game

aria.mainMenu: Open or close the main side menu

messages.connection: Or go to the address below and enter the code {{codeText}}
messages.orGoStraight: Or go straight to the address:
messages.scanQR: Scan the QR code to join
messages.selectOwnModel: Or upload your own model created with Gen-AI <Link>Teachable Machine</Link> as a zip file.

actions.all: Send new classifying label to all
actions.single: Send new classifying label to single user

titles.setSingle: Set new challenge for individual players
